0.text: Bug 16858  Preceding space in package compression pattern sometimes ignored.

1.text: (In the following discussion, all patterns were entered without the  enclosing quote marks.)

2.text: The pattern "1 " causes one character of each package name to be  displayed with a single space separator between them.

3.text: The pattern " 1 " causes one space to precede the first single-character  package name and two spaces to appear between each one.

4.text: Both of the above cases were expected.

5.text: However, if you set the patttern to  " 1" (i.e.

6.text: space before, but no space after), no spaces are displayed in the  result.
